title: The Good Earth
desc: This is based on the 1931 novel of the same name by Pearl S. Buck.

title: Women in Love
desc: This is based on the 1920 novel of the same name by D.H. Lawrence.

title: Doctor Zhivago
desc: This is based on the 1957 novel of the same name by Boris Pasternak.

title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
desc: This is based on the 1952 novel The Bridge Over the River Kwai (original French title: Le Pont de la Rivière Kwaï) by Pierre Boulle.

title: They Won’t Forget
desc: This is based on the 1936 novel Death in the Deep South by Ward Greene.

title: Conquest
desc: This is based on the 1933 novel Pani Walewska by Wacław Gąsiorowski.

title: Bringing Up Baby
desc: This is based on the 1937 short story of the same name by Hagar Wilde.

title: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
desc: This is based on the 1812 fairy tale "Snow White" by the Brothers Grimm.

title: Cinderella
desc: This is based on the 1697 fairy tale of the same name by Charles Perrault.

title: Cinderella
desc: This is based on the 1697 fairy tale of the same name by Charles Perrault.

title: Three Comrades
desc: This is based on the 1936 novel of the same name by Erich Maria Remarque.

title: The Shopworn Angel
desc: This is based on the 1918 short story "Private Pettigrew's Girl" by Dana Burnet.

title: The Old Maid
desc: This is based on the 1924 novella The Old Maid: The 'Fifties by Edith Wharton.

title: The Rains Came
desc: This is based on the 1937 novel of the same name by Louis Bromfield.

title: Beauty and the Beast
desc: This is based on the 18th-century French fairy tale of the same name by Jeanne-Marie Leprince de Beaumont, itself adapted from a fairy tale written by French novelist Gabrielle-Suzanne Barbot de Villeneuve.

title: Hidden Figures
desc: This is loosely based on the 2016 non-fiction book Hidden Figures: The American Dream and the Untold Story of the Black Women Who Helped Win the Space Race by Margot Lee Shetterly.

title: A Monster Calls
desc: This is based on the 2011 novel of the same name by Patrick Ness, from an original idea by Siobhan Dowd.

title: The Bye Bye Man
desc: This is based on the chapter "The Bridge to Body Island" in the 2005 book The President's Vampire: Strange-but-True Tales of the United States of America by Robert Damon Schneck.

title: Live by Night
desc: This is based on the 2012 novel of the same name by Dennis Lehane.

title: Patriots Day
desc: This is based on the 2015 non-fiction book Boston Strong: A City's Triumph Over Tragedy by Casey Sherman and Dave Wedge.

title: Silence
desc: This is based on the 1966 novel of the same name by Shūsaku Endō.

title: A Dog’s Purpose
desc: This is based on the 2010 novel of the same name by W. Bruce Cameron.

title: Before I Fall
desc: This is based on the 2010 novel of the same name by Lauren Oliver.

title: The Shack
desc: This is based on the 2007 novel of the same name by William P. Young.

title: The Boss Baby
desc: This is based on the 2010 picture book of the same name by Marla Frazee.

title: The Zookeeper’s Wife
desc: This is based on the 2007 non-fiction book of the same name by Diane Ackerman.

title: The Case for Christ
desc: This is based on the 1998 book of the same name by Lee Strobel.

title: The Circle
desc: This is based on the 2013 novel of the same name by Dave Eggers.

title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: The Long Haul
desc: This is based on the ninth and tenth books in the series, Diary of a Wimpy Kid: The Long Haul (2014) and Diary of a Wimpy Kid: Old School (2015), and one element each based on the seventh and eighth books, Diary of a Wimpy Kid: The Third Wheel (2012) and Diary of a Wimpy Kid: Hard Luck (2013) by Jeff Kinney.

title: Everything, Everything
desc: This is based on the 2015 novel of the same name by Nicola Yoon.

title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
desc: This is based on the children's novel series Captain Underpants by Dav Pilkey, first published in 1997.

title: The Mountain Between Us
desc: This is based on the 2011 novel of the same name by Charles Martin.

title: Same Kind of Different as Me
desc: This is based on the 2006 non-fiction book Same Kind of Different As Me: A Modern-Day Slave, an International Art Dealer, and the Unlikely Woman Who Bound Them Together by Ron Hall, Denver Moore, and Lynn Vincent.

title: The War with Grandpa
desc: This is based on the 1984 novel of the same name by Robert Kimmel Smith.

title: Red Sparrow
desc: This is based on the 2013 novel of the same name by Jason Matthews.

title: Wonder
desc: This is based on the 2012 novel of the same name by R.J. Palacio.

title: Murder on the Orient Express
desc: This is based on the 1934 novel of the same name by Agatha Christie.

title: Ferdinand
desc: This is based on the 1936 children's book The Story of Ferdinand by Munro Leaf and Robert Lawson.

title: The Finest Hours
desc: This is based on the 2007 non-fiction book The Finest Hours: The True Story of the U.S. Coast Guard's Most Daring Sea Rescue by Michael J. Tougias and Casey Sherman.

title: Whiskey Tango Foxtrot
desc: This is based on the 2011 memoir The Taliban Shuffle: Strange Days in Afghanistan and Pakistan by Kim Barker.

title: Miracles from Heaven
desc: This is based on the 2015 memoir Miracles from Heaven: A Little Girl, Her Journey to Heaven, and Her Amazing Story of Healing by Christy Beam.

title: I Saw the Light
desc: This is based on the 1994 book Hank Williams: The Biography by Colin Escott, George Merritt, and William MacEwen

title: Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates
desc: This is based on the 2014 book Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates: And a Thousand Cocktails by Mike Stangle and Dave Stangle.

title: The Infiltrator
desc: This is based on the 2009 autobiography The Infiltrator: My Secret Life Inside the Dirty Banks Behind Pablo Escobar's Medellín Cartel by Robert Mazur.

title: Pete’s Dragon
desc: This is based on an unpublished short story "Pete's Dragon and the U.S.A. (Forever After)" by Seton I. Miller and S.S. Field.

title: Ben-Hur
desc: This is based on the 1880 novel Ben-Hur: A Tale of the Christ by Lew Wallace.

title: War Dogs
desc: This is based on the 2015 non-fiction book Arms and the Dudes: How Three Stoners from Miami Beach Became the Most Unlikely Gunrunners in History by Guy Lawson.

title: Hands of Stone
desc: This is based on the 2006 biography Hands of Stone: The Life and Legend of Roberto Duran by Christian Giudice.

title: The Light Between Oceans
desc: This is based on the 2012 novel of the same name by M.L. Stedman.

title: Sully
desc: This is based on the 2009 autobiography Highest Duty: My Search for What Really Matters by Chesley Sullenberger and Jeffrey Zaslow.

title: Robinson Crusoe
desc: This is loosely based on the 1719 novel Robinson Crusoe by Daniel Defoe.

title: Snowden
desc: This is based on the 2014 non-fiction book The Snowden Files: The Inside Story of the World's Most Wanted Man by Luke Harding and the 2015 novel Time of the Octopus by Anatoly Kucherena.

title: Miss Peregrine’s Home for Peculiar Children
desc: This is based on the 2011 novel of the same name by Ransom Riggs.

title: Queen of Katwe
desc: This is based on the 2012 non-fiction book The Queen of Katwe: A Story of Life, Chess, and One Extraordinary Girl's Dream of Becoming a Grandmaster by Tim Crothers.

title: Middle School: The Worst Years of My Life
desc: This is based on the 2011 novel of the same name by James Patterson and Chris Tebbetts.

title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
desc: This is based on the 2013 novel Never Go Back by Lee Child.

title: Billy Lynn’s Long Halftime Walk
desc: This is based on the 2012 novel of the same name by Ben Fountain.

title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
desc: This is inspired by the 2001 guide book of the same name by J.K. Rowling.

title: The Bounce Back
desc: This is based on the 2008 self-help book The Bounce Back Book: How to Thrive in the Face of Adversity, Setbacks, and Losses by Karen Salmansohn.

title: Nocturnal Animals
desc: This is based on the 1993 novel Tony and Susan by Austin Wright.

title: American Sniper
desc: This is loosely based on the 2012 memoir American Sniper: The Autobiography of the Most Lethal Sniper in U.S. Military History by Chris Kyle.

title: Mortdecai
desc: This is based on the 1972 novel Don't Point that Thing at Me by Kyril Bonfiglioli.

title: Seventh Son
desc: This is loosely based on the 2004 novel The Spook's Apprentice (retitled The Last Apprentice: Revenge of the Witch in the US) by Joseph Delaney.

title: The DUFF
desc: This is based on the 2011 novel of the same name by Kody Keplinger.

title: Still Alice
desc: This is based on the 2007 novel of the same name by Lisa Genova.

title: The Gunman
desc: This is based on the 1981 novel The Prone Gunman (original French title: La position du tireur couché) by Jean-Patrick Manchette.

title: The Longest Ride
desc: This is based on the 2013 novel of the same name by Nicholas Sparks.

title: True Story
desc: This is based on the 2005 memoir True Story: Murder, Memoir, Mea Culpa by Michael Finkel.

title: Far from the Madding Crowd
desc: This is based on the 1874 novel of the same name by Thomas Hardy.

title: A Walk in the Woods
desc: This is based on the 1998 memoir A Walk in the Woods: Rediscovering America on the Appalachian Trail by Bill Bryson.

title: 90 Minutes in Heaven
desc: This is on the 2004 nonfiction book of the same name by Don Piper and Cecil Murphey.

title: Black Mass
desc: This is based on the 2001 nonfiction book Black Mass: The True Story of an Unholy Alliance Between the FBI and the Irish Mob by Dick Lehr and Gerard O'Neill.

title: Captive
desc: This is based on the 2005 non-fiction book Unlikely Angel: The Untold Story of the Atlanta Hostage Hero by Ashley Smith.

title: The Walk
desc: This is based on the 2002 memoir To Reach the Clouds: My High Wire Walk Between the Twin Towers by Philippe Petit.

title: Steve Jobs
desc: This is based on the 2011 book of the same name by Walter Isaacson.

title: The 33
desc: This is based on the 2014 non-fiction book Deep Down Dark: The Untold Stories of 33 Men Buried in a Chilean Mine, and the Miracle That Set Them Free by Héctor Tobar.

title: My All American
desc: This is based on the 2011 nonfiction book Courage Beyond the Game: The Freddie Steinmark Story by Jim Dent.

title: Secret in Their Eyes
desc: This is based on the 2005 novel La pregunta de sus ojos by Eduardo Sacheri.

title: Victor Frankenstein
desc:
This is based on the 1818 novel Frankenstein; or, The Modern Prometheus by Mary Shelley.

A list of adaptations can be found here.

title: In the Heart of the Sea
desc: This is based on the 2000 non-fiction book In the Heart of the Sea: The Tragedy of the Whaleship Essex by Nathaniel Philbrick.

title: Legends of Oz: Dorothy’s Return
desc: This is loosely based on the 1989 children's novel Dorothy of Oz by Roger Stanton Baum.

title: The Railway Man
desc: This is based on the 1995 autobiography of the same name by Eric Lomax.

title: The Drop
desc: This is based on the 2009 short story "Animal Rescue" by Dennis Lehane.

title: Dracula Untold
desc:
This is loosely based on the 1897 novel Dracula by Bram Stoker.

A list of adaptations can be found here.

title: The Theory of Everything
desc: This is based on the 1999 memoir Travelling to Infinity: My Life with Stephen by Jane Hawking,

title: Wild
desc: This is based on the 2012 memoir Wild: From Lost to Found on the Pacific Crest Trail by Cheryl Strayed.

title: The Imitation Game
desc: This is based on the 1983 biography Alan Turing: The Enigma by Andrew Hodges.

title: T2 Trainspotting
desc: This is based on the novels Trainspotting (1993) and Porno (2002) by Irvine Welsh.

title: Short Cuts
desc: This is based on nine short stories and a poem by Raymond Carver.

title: Death on the Nile
desc: This is based on the 1937 novel of the same name by Agatha Christie.

title: The Disaster Artist
desc: This is based on the 2013 non-fiction book The Disaster Artist: My Life Inside The Room, the Greatest Bad Movie Ever Made by Greg Sestero and Tom Bissell.

title: The Midnight Meat Train
desc: This is based on the 1984 short story of the same name by Clive Barker.

title: Mickey, Donald, Goofy: The Three Musketeers
desc:
This is based on the 1844 novel The Three Musketeers by Alexandre Dumas père.

A list of adaptations can be found here.

title: The Sun Is Also a Star
desc: This is based on the 2016 young adult novel of the same name by Nicola Yoon.

title: Shopgirl
desc: This is based on his 2000 novella of the same name by Steve Martin.

title: Notes on a Scandal
desc: This is based on the 2003 novel of the same name by Zoë Heller.

title: The Virgin Suicides
desc: This is based on the 1993 novel of the same name by Jeffrey Eugenides.

title: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
desc: This is based on the 1971 novel Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas: A Savage Journey to the Heart of the American by Hunter S. Thompson.

title: Lolita
desc: This is based on a 1955 novel of the same name by Vladimir Nabokov.

title: The Girl with All the Gifts
desc: This is based on the 2014 novel of the same name by M.R. Carey, which was itself based on 2013 short story Iphigenia In Aulis, also by M.R. Carey.
